Package com.astamuse.asta4d.render

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ElementSetter
    An ElementSetter is to be used to reset an element, including attribute setting and any child nodes operations.
    Renderable
    A callback interface that allows delay the rendering logic until the real rendering is required
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeSetter
    An AttributeSetter is used to set attribute value of an element.
    ChildReplacer
    A ChildReplacer will empty the target Element first, then add the new child node to the target element.
    DebugRenderer
    When this renderer is applied, the current rendering element (see Context.setCurrentRenderingElement(Element)) will be output by logger in debug level.
    ElementNotFoundHandler  
    ElementRemover  
    GoThroughRenderer
    This Renderer will do nothing, the Rendering process will jump over a render if it is a GoThroughRenderer.
    Renderer
    A renderer is for describing rendering actions.
    RendererTestHelper  
    RenderUtil
    This class is a functions holder which supply the ability of applying rendereres to certain Element.
    TextSetter
    A TextSetter will empty the target element at first, then add a new text node to the target element
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RendererType
    for performance reason, we use enum to identify the special renderers.
    SpecialRenderer
